title: Kedaya Kedakuren Lyrics in Tamil From Kalari Movie
stanzas:
Kedaya Kedakuren
un nenjula thala saaya.
nadaya nadakkuren
ada unake thunaiyaaga

unna naan paarthathum
yeruthu kaaichale
kannula kadhalin
ettukaal paaichale

Kedaya Kedakuren
un nenjula thala saaya.
nadaya nadakkuren
ada unake thunaiyaaga

kodai mazhaipole
en kaattil neeye
yendi yaendi
ena paadaa paduthura

Kedaya Kedakuren
un nenjula thala saaya.
nadaya nadakkuren
ada unake thunaiyaaga

un veettukkum
ada en veettukum
ulla dhooram inge
kuraiyaathaa.

indru un kannamum
ada en kannamum
chinna muthangalaal
niraiyaathaa

yedho edhirpaarthu
naan odaa thenjene
kaadaa, kaanjaen,
ada mazhaiyaai kudhikkuren.
